names.english: clear heat and reduce toxin preparation
names.commonEnglish: Clear Heat and Reduce Toxin Preparation

actions: Discharges Exterior conditions, releases the muscles, especially of the neck and upper back, relieves Heat, generates fluids and vents rashes.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity and vents and disperses External Wind-Heat.
With Lian Qiao, for various Heat disorders.
With Gan Cao, for toxic swellings and sores.
With Lian Qiao and Ban Lan Gen, for throat soreness and swelling.
Clears Heat especially in the Upper Jiao, clears Blood Heat, relieves toxicity, reduces abscesses and dissipates clumps.
With Ban Lan Gen, for any externally contracted Heat disorder.
With Ban Lan Gen and Da Qing Ye, for mumps and erysipelas.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity, cools the Blood and dissipates maculae.
With Jin Yin Hua, for toxic Heat sores, erysipelas, mumps, or sore throat.
Drains Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and cools the Blood.
Aromatically transforms Dampness, releases the Exterior, transforms turbidity and treats dermatosis and fungal infection.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat and detoxifies.
With Ban Lan Gen, for Wind-Heat with a sore throat.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Jin Yin Hua, for Damp rashes or acne.
Clears Heat
Resolves Fire toxicity
Vents and disperses External Wind-Heat
Cools Blood Heat
Reduces abscesses
Dissipates clumps

symptoms: High fever may be worse at night
Excessive skin rashes all over body
Hemorrhage Hematemesis Hemoptysis Epistaxis Hemafecia Hematuria
manifestations.tongue: Deep red or Deep red and dry or Purple red
manifestations.pulse: Rapid or Thready and rapid or Thready and feeble
